nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING ISSUED FOR THE NORTHEASTERN COAST OF  MEXICO...
summary:
...TROPICAL STORM WARNING ISSUED FOR THE NORTHEASTERN COAST OF  MEXICO...
 As of 7:00 AM CDT Tue Jun 18
 the center of One was located near 21.5, -92.8
 with movement N at 6 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 999 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.
